attributes.review:
Bee Movie Script - Dialogue Transcript

  
According to all known laws
of aviation,

  
there is no way a bee
should be able to fly.

  
Its wings are too small to get
its fat little body off the ground.

  
The bee, of course, flies anyway

  
because bees don't care
what humans think is impossible.

  
Yellow, black. Yellow, black.
Yellow, black. Yellow, black.

  
Ooh, black and yellow!
Let's shake it up a little.

  
Barry! Breakfast is ready!

  
Ooming!

  
Hang on a second.

  
Hello?

  
- Barry?
- Adam?

  
- Oan you believe this is happening?
- I can't. I'll pick you up.

  
Looking sharp.

  
Use the stairs. Your father
paid good money for those.

  
Sorry. I'm excited.

  
Here's the graduate.
We're very proud of you, son.

  
A perfect report card, all B's.

  
Very proud.

  
Ma! I got a thing going here.

  
- You got lint on your fuzz.
- Ow! That's me!

  
- Wave to us! We'll be in row 118,000.
- Bye!
attributes.title: the worst app ever

attributes.review: it took a MONTH to download🤬!!! when it finally downloaded 🥱my dog 🐕 started having a seizure ☠️and died right next to me🙏🏼.  the next day 🌞when i opened the app 📱 it’s started calling me the f slur😤 and called me a fat b-word🤧. i deleted the app 👎🏼 and downloaded it again 😾to see if it would work better but it got worse!! i ended up getting 68 viruses 🦠🦠🦠🦠 🦠 🦠🦠 🦠and it started glitching very bad that i had to buy a new phone! i demand this app to get deleted😡 it’s very inappropriate and very disappointing 😤😤no trump 2020✨✨
attributes.title: worst app

attributes.review: the app took 2,020 hours to download as soon as the app downloaded it said “trump 2020 make amerikkka great for the straight white men again!❤️” then asked if i was a straight white man i said no because i am not a straight white man.🙃 my phone flew out of my hand and went in the microwave then it filled up with chetto puffs the numbers turned into words saying donald trump the and the beeping noise was replaced by trumps voice 📣. saying “i am a racist and rapist you just need to except that” the microwave opened up the cheeto puffs made a orange 🍊 portrait of donald trump naked i immediately fell into cardiac arrest 😅 for the past 3 days ive only been able to say “trump 2020 yes he’s racist yes he rapes children but thats ok” 🥶 i highly discourage you to support trump i made a foolish mistake leaving with a broken microwave and fear of orange men who wear suits 🥰
attributes.title: it broke my microwave😡🐜

attributes.review: Worst. App. Ever. I downloaded it hoping to see exclusive info about my fav (trumpy poo😍🍊) BUT it took 3 weeks to download and as soon as I opened it I had explosive diarrhea all over!! To make matters worse I was at church and we were silently praying🙏 my diarrhea went everywhere including all over the pastor!! Then everyone started to have diarrhea and the church began to crumble from the explosives. Then the app started to blast offensive words and phrases loud enough to hear over the eruption of everyone’s bowls. Never been more upset 0/5
attributes.title: Made me violently ill!🤢

attributes.review: This terrible grasshopper attacked me which led me to fall and caused a scene in the grocery shop because so many fruits fell and a bunch of people got mad Next what happened was that someone set the store on fire 🔥 then the pigs we're called and someone calling the HOT HOT firefighters ugh I have a huge crush on firefighters 🥵but anyways the racist pigs asked who had caused the scene and I said the grasshopper attacked me but they sent ME to jail because I wasn't a green grasshopper like them!! I snuck my backup phone inside the jail cell so in writing a bad review!!

attributes.title: black lives matter

attributes.review: I wouldn’t recommend supporting an app that is ran by a man who hides in a bunker when his country needed him the most. I would not recommend supporting an app that is ran by a man who says that BLM is a “hate group”. I would not recommend supporting an app that is ran by a man who is completely incompetent as a leader of the United States. The fact that there are still people giving this app 5 stars and supporting this man is appalling and disgraceful. Don’t get this app, or else like him you’re a disappointment to our country.
